Package brickdestroy.model

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
brickdestroy.model.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
A wall class that is responsible to set and get the state of the level, player, ball and bricks.

      brickCount - the number of bricks
      lineCount - the number of lines of bricks
      brickDimensionRatio - the dimension ratio of brick
      Returns:
      brick arrangement
